EmailTemplate.name: FalconConnect Web Portal Request
EmailTemplate.subject: FalconConnect Portal Access Request Approved {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for requesting access to FalconConnect account information for {!Case.Description}.
Access has been approved and you will now be able to view the account information for your Company. If you have any trouble logging in, please try closing your browser, delete your session cookies and try again.
Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you for your continued business.
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Falcon-Connect
Account Services
